text: Hanki anama hute'za maka zupama tevefi kre fananema nehaza ofaramina nehu'za, kasefa ikama eme antegeno'ma nehia ofa nehu'za, Ra Anumzamofoma mono'ma hunenteno musema hu knama huhamparinte'naza knaramintera kresramna nevu'za musenkasea hu'naze. Ana nehazage'za mago'a vahe'mo'za, zamagra'a zamavesite'ma Ra Anumzamofoma ami ofanena eri'za azage'za ofa hu'naze.
